name: Climb of the seasons
description:
Survive an uphill infinite runner as a rover climbing the hill as the seasons and years pass.

You steer a rover up a hill as you go through a year with all four seasons with some seasons having unique ambience and look. As you play you will have to dodge various hazards and obstacles, some being unique to the specific season you are in.

The game will continue getting harder and harder as the years progress.

Special hazards:

Lightning will disable controls until you press left and right arrow keys simultaneously

Hail will slow your turning speed

Hope you enjoy this first dive of mine into the Godot engine. Any feedback is appreciated.
